items.translated_title: Speechify adds voice typing and voice assistant to its Chrome extension
items.content: In the last 12 months, there has been a proliferation of voice detection tools, thanks to overall quality improvement in speech recognition models. Speechify is hitching its wagon to this train and launching its own dictation tool with support for English.
